nodes.text: Given to diplomats, the Order of Chandrila was one of the most famous Republic Seal of Service awards of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. As a Seal of Service, it was fitted with a specialized transponder that identified the recipient and their accomplishments. The award shared its name with the planet Chandrila.
The Order of Chandrila was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
